root.name: Hold Down Hoppip
root.description: OverviewYou control a Pichu and have to stop the Hoppips from floating away. You do this by jumping up and pulling their rope down. If even one Hoppip gets to the top of the screen, it's game over. There's also a high score tracker that keeps track of your best time. Your best time is saved on your E-reader, even after you turn off the game.ControlsA: Jump/Pull RopeD-Pad: Move PichuHow to AccessScan in the following cards on your GBA E-Reader from the Pokemon Expedition-e Set:#58 - Pichu (R)#112 - Hoppip (C)
